title: The 5 best Amazon deals you can get this Tuesday
text:
The 5 best Amazon deals you can get this Tuesday

Save on incredible tech products with these Amazon deals. (Photo: Reviewed)

— Our editors review and recommend products to help you buy the stuff you need. If you make a purchase by clicking one of our links, we may earn a small share of the revenue. However, our picks and opinions are independent from USA Today’s newsroom and any business incentives.

There are few things that bring me more excitement than finding a good deal, especially if it's something that I've been eyeing for a while. I mean, if I'm going to buy something anyway, I might as well save on it. This Tuesday is one of those days. I found incredible prices on Echo Shows, Ember mugs, meat thermometers, and more. Even better, we've personally tested these products and price tracked them, so you know you're getting your money's worth.

1. $25 off: A compact Echo show

This compact Echo Show performs similarly as the big guy at a fraction of the price. (Photo: Amazon)

This Prime Day, I decided to get an Echo Show 5 because it was a whopping $40. I love that its a compact version of the popular Show model, but it still has a screen so I can see timers, get visual weather forecasts, and sing along to lyrics of the songs I don't know. It's smaller size also makes it more affordable—and it's even more affordable right now with this deal. Right now, $25 is knocked off it's price tag, which is its second lowest price since by $15.

Get the Echo Show 5 for $64.99 (Save $25)

2. 10% off: This popular warming mug

Lukewarm coffee will be a thing of the past. (Photo: Reviewed / Jackson Ruckar)

There are few things more annoying than making your favorite cup of tea, only to have it lukewarm 20 minutes late. Most mugs can't keep things at optimal drinking temperature, so you have limited time for the perfect sip, which is terrible for forgetful people like me. The Ember mug, however, comes with a nifty app that lets you set the perfect temperature of whatever you're drinking for up to two hours. I tested and loved the Ember Travel Mug, but you can get their ceramic mug for just $72 right now, which is great for home or the office.

Get the Ember Temperature Control Smart Mug for $71.95 (Save $8)

3. Lowest price: A great basic yoga mat

Get into your flow with this affordable mat. (Photo: Amazon)

If you ever wanted to pick up yoga, but don't want to pay for an expensive mat, then this is the deal for you. This mat from AmazonBasics is the best starter yoga mat we've ever tested. We found that it has great cushioning for beginner's knees, had a non-slip surface, and was affordable enough that you won't feel bad about buying it if you quit yoga after a month. Right now, you can get it at its lowest price in a variety of colors, so there's no excuse to start practicing downward dog.

Get the AmazonBasics 1/2-Inch Extra Thick Exercise Mat for $16.51 (Save $2.48)

4. Lowest price: A probe thermometer for expert roasting

Monitor you turkey this Thanksgiving. (Photo: ThermoPro)

If you don't want to overcook your turkey (again) this Thanksgiving, then you're going to want to use a probe meat thermometer. they allow you to continuously read the temperature of whatever you're roasting or grilling—without opening the oven door. This one from ThermoPro is one of the best probe thermometers we've ever tested because it comes with two probes, you can monitor your meat wirelessly, and it has a clear alarm. Right now, it's back down to the lowest price we've ever seen on Amazon.

Get the ThermoPro TP20 for $50.99 (Save $9)

5. Lowest price ever: Our favorite roasting rack

A dry bird will be a thing of the past thanks to this pan. (Photo: Viking)

Speaking of turkey: You're going to want to cook it in the best roasting pan money can buy. That way you won’t be left with a dry bird—and you can use it to roast chicken the rest of the year. This one from Viking is the best roasting rack we’ve ever tested, and right now, it’s back down to the lowest price we’ve ever seen. We loved this model because it had an excellent heat distribution, was comfortable to hold, and it was the easiest to clean of all the pans we tested.

Get the Viking 3-Ply Stainless Steel Roasting Pan for $99.98 (Save $49.97)

Prices were accurate at the time this article was published but may change over time.
